name: Don't Fry Michel!
description:
Michel Poisson was a regular, happy fish. A hake, to be more precise. He lived in the buck just like the other hakes. Until, one day, Chong the cook, owner of the buck, decided to replace breathable, fresh water with boiling oil. The horror… Michel has seen... The last hake must escape…

How To Play :

2 Players versus game.

Michel has to survive by jumping on platforms which can be destroyed by Chong by shooting at them.

Chong can also pick-up power-ups :
Red Power-up gives a temporary buff to Chong's reload speed.
Black Power-up allows Chong to launch a massive charged shot.

Michel's Controls :
- A / D to Move
- W to Jump

Chong's Controls :
- Left Arrow / Right Arrow to move
- Up Arrow to Fire
- Right Shift to use Black Power-up

Credits :

Axel Born - Code
Grégory Colletto - Code
Jérémy Forveille - Art
Florian Costes - Audio

Thanks to Leonard Bertos for the written lore.
